languages.text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.
languages.original_text: Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} прорицания к союзнику, псайкер накладывает на него эффект "сверхъестественное везение", если союзник еще не обладает таким эффектом. Сверхъестественное везение: когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, оно становится обычным, а этот эффект снимается.

traits.locale_text: When the Psyker uses a Divination psychic power on an ally without an Unnatural Luck effect, that ally gains Unnatural Luck. Unnatural Luck: When the ally suffers a critical hit, it becomes a usual hit instead and the Unnatural Luck is removed.

When the psyker uses a Divination psychic power on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a critical hit, it becomes a normal hit instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

languages.text: 当灵能者对没有“超凡幸运”效果的盟友使用占卜系{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，会赐予该盟友“超凡幸运”效果。 超凡幸运：当盟友遭受{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，此次暴击会变为普通{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，之后“超凡幸运”效果消失。
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: 当灵能者对没有“超凡幸运”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}的盟友使用占卜系灵能力量时，会赐予该盟友“超凡幸运”效果。 超凡幸运：当盟友遭受暴击时，此次暴击会变为普通{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}，之后“超凡幸运”效果消失。

languages.text: Cuando el psíquico utiliza un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} de adivinación en un aliado que no tenga el efecto suerte antinatural, ese aliado recibe dicho efecto. Suerte antinatural: cuando el aliado sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, se convierte en un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} normal y pierde el efecto suerte antinatural.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el psíquico utiliza un poder psíquico de adivinación en un aliado que no tenga el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} suerte antinatural, ese aliado recibe dicho efecto. Suerte antinatural: cuando el aliado sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico, se convierte en un impacto normal y pierde el efecto suerte antinatural.

languages.text: 不自然な幸運の効果を受けていない仲間に異能者がディビネーションの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使うと、その仲間は不自然な幸運を得る。 不自然な幸運：{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を仲間が受けた際、その{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}は通常のヒットとなり不自然な幸運の効果は消える。
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: 不自然な幸運の効果を受けていない仲間に異能者がディビネーションの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使うと、その仲間は不自然な幸運を得る。 不自然な幸運：{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を仲間が受けた際、その{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}は通常のヒットとなり不自然な幸運の効果は消える。

languages.text: Применяя {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} прорицания к союзнику, псайкер накладывает на него эффект "сверхъестественное везение", если союзник еще не обладает таким эффектом. Сверхъестественное везение: когда союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, оно становится обычным, а этот эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Применяя психосилу гадания к союзнику, псайкер накладывает на него {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} "сверхъестественное везение", если союзник еще не обладает таким эффектом. Сверхъестественное везение: когда союзник получает критическое {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, оно становится обычным, а этот эффект снимается.

Применяя психосилу гадания к союзнику, псайкер накладывает на него {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} "сверхъестественное везение", если союзник еще не обладает таким эффектом. Сверхъестественное везение: когда союзник получает критическое {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, оно становится обычным, а этот эффект снимается.

languages.text: Wenn der Psioniker die {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} Prophezeiung auf einen Verbündeten ohne Unnatürliches Glück-Effekt wirkt, erlangt dieser Unnatürliches Glück. Unnatürliches Glück: Wenn der Verbündete einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erleidet, wird dieser auf einen normalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} reduziert und der Effekt Unnatürliches Glück wird entfernt.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Psioniker die psionische Kraft Prophezeiung auf einen Verbündeten ohne Unnatürliches Glück-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} wirkt, erlangt dieser Unnatürliches Glück. Unnatürliches Glück: Wenn der Verbündete einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} erleidet, wird dieser auf einen normalen Treffer reduziert und der Effekt Unnatürliches Glück wird entfernt.

languages.text: Lorsque le psyker utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} de type Divination sur un allié qui n'est pas sous l'effet de Chance surnaturelle, cet allié obtient Chance surnaturelle. Chance surnaturelle : lorsqu'un allié subit un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, celui-ci se transforme en {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} standard et l'effet Chance surnaturelle se dissipe.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le psyker utilise un pouvoir psychique Divination sur un allié qui n'est pas sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de Chance Contre Nature, cet allié obtient Chance Contre Nature. Chance Contre Nature : lorsqu'un allié subit un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique, celui-ci se transforme en coup standard et l'effet Chance Contre Nature se dissipe.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, doğaüstü şans etkisine sahip olmayan bir dost birim üzerinde bir kehanet {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullanırsa o dost birim, doğaüstü şans etkisi kazanır. Doğaüstü Şans: Bu etkiye sahip dost birime yapılan bir {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g}, normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşa{/g} dönüşür ve doğaüstü şansı etkisi ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: When the psyker uses a divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on an ally without an unnatural luck effect, that ally gains unnatural luck. Unnatural Luck: when the ally suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it becomes a normal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} instead and the unnatural luck effect is removed.
